text:
### [Codacy](https://www.codacy.com/app/lesteve/nilearn/commit?cid=13573588) detected an issue:
#### Message: `Access to member 'last_log_lik' before its definition line 821`
#### Occurred on:
- **Commit**:  c7af1f34d7cbecf347b3039f962b33980e226265
- **File**:    [nilearn/group_sparse_covariance.py](https://github.com/nilearn/nilearn/blob/c7af1f34d7cbecf347b3039f962b33980e226265/nilearn/group_sparse_covariance.py)
- **LineNum**: [815](https://github.com/nilearn/nilearn/blob/c7af1f34d7cbecf347b3039f962b33980e226265/nilearn/group_sparse_covariance.py#L815)
- **Code**:    `if iter_n > -1 and self.last_log_lik > log_lik:`
#### Currently on:
- **Commit**:  5b5d8d206c03c3c65ee22896d2850bbb886b333a
- **File**:    [nilearn/group_sparse_covariance.py](https://github.com/nilearn/nilearn/blob/5b5d8d206c03c3c65ee22896d2850bbb886b333a/nilearn/group_sparse_covariance.py)
- **LineNum**: [816](https://github.com/nilearn/nilearn/blob/5b5d8d206c03c3c65ee22896d2850bbb886b333a/nilearn/group_sparse_covariance.py#L816)

This is something I noticed in landscape.io ages ago, creating an issue for this so we don't forget about it.
title: Access to member 'last_log_lik' before its definition line 821
